attributes.action: MAKE UK CUSTOMS IN AIRPORTS LIKE AUSTRAILIA'S
attributes.additional_details:
UK is getting fuller and fuller and loads just come for benifit.

I think the points system needs to be brought from Austrailia to UK to stop to many people from outside moving to the UK for Jobs that don't really need no one. And Jobs that are in need let some people in to UK.


Holiday makers should be still welcome.
